title: [K-12] Augmented Reality (AR)-Based Professional Language Competency Development Program

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Language Proficiency and Experience in Utilizing Digital Devices
context.additional_context: Process of establishing AR-based language practice environments using digital devices (tablets/smartphones), with asynchronous learning activities conducted through LMS

learning_goals: Learners can use professional language expressions (e.g., business negotiation, presentations) with over 80% accuracy in an AR simulation environment
Learners can explain at least three language use strategies tailored to cultural contexts using AR tools
Learners can correct over 90% of language errors identified during AR learning through peer and self-assessment
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
